thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Gineverg

author: Gineverg
title: Gineverg
text:
From start to finish our experience with TrustedHousesitters has been superb. It was easy to follow all the instructions on posting information about our requirements and we soon had several sitters to choose from.
The sitter who came to us was superb in every way and we couldn't fault her. She took great care of our dog, house and car and I wish she lived nearer so that we could see each other as friends!
